name: Cheating the Extraterrestrials
description:
"Hey Dave, I know how bad you are at games so I put in some cheats in for you."

You are an astronaut who has been kidnaped by aliens! Fortunately, the aliens die in one hit; unfortunately, the aliens have never heard of door so you have no way of getting from room to room. Or do you?

Made for Major Jam 4: Cosmic.
